title: Add clickable dish images with larger-image modal in Customer Portal

requirements.text: Add real dish images (static assets) for each sample menu item in the Customer Portal menu (Pizza, Burger, Biryani, Pasta, Sandwich, Noodles), replacing the current emoji-only presentation.

quotes: add images to dishes and all as to worked when we clicked it

acceptanceCriteria: Each item in the Customer Portal "Food Menu" grid displays a real image loaded from a local static file (not an emoji).
Images are stored and served as static assets from the frontend (no backend involvement).
All six sample menu items (Pizza, Burger, Biryani, Pasta, Sandwich, Noodles) have corresponding images and render correctly on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Make each dish image in the Customer Portal menu clickable so that clicking the image opens a modal/popup showing a larger version of that dish image (option 1). The modal must be dismissible and must not break the existing "Order Now" button behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping a dish image in the Customer Portal "Food Menu" opens a modal/popup displaying a larger version of the same dish image.
The modal includes a clear close mechanism (e.g., close button and/or clicking outside and/or Escape key) and returns focus appropriately when closed.
The existing "Order Now" button still selects the item for the order form and continues to show the existing toast feedback.
No backend changes are introduced; this remains UI-only behavior.

requirements.text: Update the Customer Portal menu data model in frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx so each menu item references its corresponding static image filename, and wire the UI to use those image files with appropriate alt text in English.

quotes: add images to dishes and all as to worked when we clicked it

acceptanceCriteria: sampleMenuItems in frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx references image file paths for each dish image.
Rendered elements have English alt text matching the dish name (e.g., "Pizza", "Burger").
No user-facing text added by this change is non-English.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources must be composed, not edited).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Do not add or require any backend functionality; keep the application UI-only for ordering and image viewing.
nonGoals: Implementing real authentication, real order persistence, or any backend database integration.
Adding new pages or changing existing navigation/routing beyond the Customer Portal dish-image interaction.
Implementing real-time updates or external image hosting/CDN integration.

required: Square top-down photo-style image of a Margherita pizza on a plate with neutral background (dish-pizza.dim_512x512.png)
Square photo-style image of a classic burger with fries on a neutral background (dish-burger.dim_512x512.png)
Square photo-style image of chicken biryani in a bowl with neutral background (dish-biryani.dim_512x512.png)
Square photo-style image of pasta in a bowl with neutral background (dish-pasta.dim_512x512.png)
Square photo-style image of a sandwich on a plate with neutral background (dish-sandwich.dim_512x512.png)
Square photo-style image of noodles in a bowl with neutral background (dish-noodles.dim_512x512.png)
